title: So, you remember the apple girl picture, yea?
body:
It was apparently super duper offensive to show that much leg, yea?
Meanwhile this is proudly displayed in the Riot snowdown creations post:
http://cdn.leagueoflegends.com/apollo/content/snowdown/Xiamei.jpg

"But Poppy is a yordle!"
Well maybe apple girl was a yordle too. Or a 400 year old demigod. Nobody ever bothered to ask her.

######No, I'm not coming back, I just couldn't resist finding out if this thread would be deleted or not.
